ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She heard a familiar voice. Vulois? Your alive? I thought HellBeast killed you?  she transformed into bat mode and flew to Vulois. She landed and walked

::Battera::

She heard a familiar voice. "Vulois? Your alive? I thought HellBeast 
killed you?"  she transformed into bat mode and flew to Vulois.
She landed and walked slowly to Vulois. "Can you ever forgive this 
cowardly bat?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Vulois/Brix and Octociz
> 
> Vulois
> 
> After weeks of searching for scrapand hard work, the first united 
> embassy has been finished. The TM3 bot Vulois, still believed to be 
> dead by most, has decided to become an active role again.
> 
> "It is time I call upon my three!(He starts sending a personal 
> message):
> 
> Soundwave, Battera and Cybershark. It is I, Vulois. I am not dead. 
> Infact I am very much alive! I need your help for a new project 
which 
> will help bring peace. I know you might not want to come, that's 
what 
> The Matrix said, especially you Cybershark since you love battle, 
but 
> this is of grave importance. I will not tell you what it is about 
now 
> because you may not want to join me. If you do, than home in on my 
> signal and come here. Soundwave, I have known you the longest and I 
> know that meeting you was not a coincidence. Battera, I know you 
feel 
> gulty for letting Terminess and I die, but if that didn't happen, I 
> would never have been trusted with this mission. Please come, all 
of 
> you."
> 
> Vulois sits and waits.
> 
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> 
> A strange creature has pulled in front of The Cybertronian Fire
> (That's the new base, right?) It stares at it for awhile and 
marveles 
> at it. It turns out that this is no centaur, but the great Maximal 
> warrior Brix.
> 
> "Are you ready?"
> 
> <i>Of course. If I wasn't ready for what would come after I 
wouldn't 
> have helped you. Bronco is under control. Just keep your rage in 
> check and you will be fine.</i>
> 
> "Thank you, Octociz, for all you have done."
> 
> Brix/Octociz begin their final run towards the ship.
